name: Tanz
description:
Download windows standalone version below!

I started making this game without having any goal, game mechanic or anything else in mind. I just added sprites, made things move, and let things happen.

I think the game is very relaxing. You can't really lose at it, but it still takes a bit of focus.

In the end, the goal was to make the player dance with the enemies, and try find a balance of keeping enough enemies alive to score higher but not be overwhelmed at the same time.
